channel.title: 562 Custom Yell Names
channel.description: Hey guys, im coding a bit on my 562 right now this might sound a bit nubbish but where do i go to edit individual yell names say one guy wans ninja as his yell and someone else Boss? Btw, 562 rs2hd Any help appreciated.

item.title: 562 Custom Yell Names
item.dc:creator: @Mr.czar Mr.czar
item.description:
@Mr.czar wrote:

heres how add String yellText = command.substring(5); yellText = Censor.Replace(yellText); for(Player p : World.getWorld().getPlayers()) { if (player.getUsername().equals("USERNAME")) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage("<col=FF0000><shad=030303><img=0><img=1>[WHATTHEYELLWILLSAY]<img=1><img=0>czar: "+Misc.upper(yellText)); continue; }

into commandpackethandler make sure itâ€™s that one and not commandspackethandler.

change the user name to what you want. and change the other part to what you want it to say in the yelltag before his name if you wanna add more people just add: if (player.getUsername().equals("USERNAME")) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage("<col=F8000>[WHATTHEYELLSAYS]<img=1>"+player.getDisplayName()+": "+Misc.upper(yellText)); continue; }

for more just keep adding more of that below the others. col=f is an example of the color code, or color of the text.

Read full topic
